sourcesContent:
<template>
        <v-text-field label="Titel" variant="outlined" v-model="this.title"></v-text-field>
        <v-text-field label="Erscheinungsjahr" variant="outlined" v-model="this.year"></v-text-field>

        <v-data-table :items="this.data">Suchen</v-data-table>

</template>
<script>
export default {
    name: 'SearchMovies',
    data() {
        return {
            title: null,
            year: null,
            this: null,
            data: [],
            favoritemovie: null,
            isLoading: false,
            err: "",


        };
    },
    methods: {


        SearchMovies() {
            if (this.title == null && this.year == null) {
                return
            }
            else {

                let titleParam = ""
                let yearParam = ""
                let typeParam = "&type=movie"

                if (this.title != null) {
                    titleParam = `s=${this.title}`
                }
                if (this.year != null) {
                    yearParam = `&y=${this.year}`
                }
                let Searchthis = titleParam + yearParam + typeParam
                let url = `http://www.omdbapi.com/?apikey=385748cd&${Searchthis}`;
                console.log(url)

                this.fetchMovies(url)
            }
        },


        async fetchMovies(url) {
            try {
                const response = await fetch(url, {
                    method: 'GET',
                    headers: {
                        Accept: 'application/json',
                    },
                });

                if (!response.ok) {
                    throw new Error(`Error! status: ${response.status}`);
                }

                const result = await response.json();

                console.log(result.Search)

                this.data = result.Search;
            } catch (err) {
                this.err = err.message;
            } finally {
                this.isLoading = false;
            }
            console.log(this.data)
        }


    }
}

</script>
<style scoped>


.Datagrid {
    height: 1000px;
}

img {
    height: 140px;
}



#DataGridDiv {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
}


.SearchAndAdd {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
}

#SaveBt {
    color: red;
    font-size: 30px;
    background-color: antiquewhite;
}
</style>
